desc: Spectrum Energy Therapies is dedicated to bringing life-changing therapeutic PEMF machines to everyone, so that they can take charge of their own health and well-being. Our portable PEMF devices like the OctaCoil, are easily one of the best pulsed electromagnetic field therapy devices for sale on the market today.

layout.text: DO YOU SUFFER FROM PAIN? NOT GETTING ENOUGH SLEEP??
LOOK NO FURTHER! WE HAVE THE SOLUTION FOR YOU!
